text: ABS_CALL = indicating whether the transcript was present (P), absent (A), or marginal (M)

protocol.text: Columbia ecotype, 3-4 week old plants, grown in MTPS 144 conviron walk in Chamber at 22 degree C, 65% RH and 14 hr photoperiod. Leaves were harvested from four week plants.
Columbia ecotype, 3-4 week old plants, grown in MTPS 144 conviron walk in Chamber at 22 degree C, 65% RH and 14 hr photoperiod

standard Affymetrix procedures Total RNA was isolated from four-week-old plants using TRIZOL method. The experiment was carried out in triplicate and a separate group of plants was used for each set. RNA was processed and hybridized to the Affymetric Arabidopsis ATH1 genome array GeneChip following the manufacturers instructions. All probe sets on the Genechips were assigned hybridization signal above background using Affymetrix Expression Console Software v1.0.
